answers.answer: How far along are you. You are showing signs of preeclampsia from the sound of things. Best wishes and early congrats!!!
U sound like me. I'm 29w5d. No talk about delivery but gotta stay here in the hospital til my lil one is here. I was diagnosed today with mild preeclampsia.
I had pre elampsia wiv 1st and raised bp in 2 nd and av gt unstable bp am 35 and 5 days my other 2 neva gt induced untill 37 wks

question: Av been in hospital 2 nites bc me bp went too high nw its 2 low agen and av gt loads of protein in urine headachnes n stomach n back pain and i cud b gettin induced in jus ova 3 hrs urggh feel so nervous!!
